Trade/Device Name(s): Stratus® CS Acute CareTM BhCG TestPak
Stratus® CS Acute CareTM BhCG CalPak
Stratus® CS Acute CareTM BhCG DilPak
Stratus® CS Acute CareTM NT-proBNP (pBNP) TestPak
Stratus® CS Acute CareTM NT-proBNP (pBNP) CalPak
Stratus® CS Acute CareTM NT-proBNP (pBNP) DilPak
Analyte(s): Beta subunit of human chorionic gonadotropin (βhCG)
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Solid phase two-site sandwich fluorometric immunoassay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dade Behring Stratus CS Acute Care BhCG and NT-proBNP TestPak, CalPak, and DilPak for quantitative measurement in heparinized plasma using immunoassay technology
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of total βhCG in heparinized plasma for early detection of pregnancy and NT-proBNP for diagnosis, severity assessment, and risk stratification in heart failure and acute coronary syndrome, for clinical laboratory and point-of-care use
